      • submitReview

        @Permission(level=200)
public static int submitReview(int paperID,
                               int reviewerID,
                               java.io.File file)
                        throws DatabaseException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Submits a review for a paper.
        Precondition:
        requires paperID > 0;
        Postcondition:
        ensures A review is submitted
        Parameters:
        paperID - the paper id to submit to
        reviewerID - the reviewer's id
        file - the paper's file
        Returns:
        the id of the inserted review
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - the database exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
